paper_abstract: It is well known that the Pancake graph is widely used as models for interconnection networks. In this paper we prove that the automorphism group of the Pancake graph P-n, n >= 5, is the left regular representation of the symmetric group S-n. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Automorphism groups of the Pancake graphs
